00004 /* Configuring an NSTextView in an NSScrollView for horizontal scrolling,
00005    vertical scrolling, or both is so complicated that when I figured it out
00006    I decided to write a category for it.  No more trial-and-error with
00007    stupid checkboxes in Interface Builder!!
00008  
00009    For this to work, the NSTextView must be enclosed in an NSScrollView,
00010    with an invisible NSLayoutManager, NSText, NSTextStorage etc.
00011    This is the way it comes off the Library Palette in Interface Builder 3.
00012  
00013    Has only been tested with horizontal=YES and vertical=YES so far.
00014 */
